name: plugin-infrastructure
description: Reusable infrastructure relating to testing, building, and deploying my WordPress plugins.
author: Mayank Majeji

scripts.bump:patch: bump patch --commit 'Version %s.' smart-cloudflare-turnstile.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.bump:minor: bump minor --commit 'Version %s.' smart-cloudflare-turnstile.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.bump:major: bump major --commit 'Version %s.' smart-cloudflare-turnstile.php package.json package-lock.json readme.txt
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && npm run lint:html && composer run lint
scripts.test:all: npm run lint:all && composer run test && npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
